Package net.beadsproject.beads.data.audiofile

Interface AudioFileReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaSoundAudioFile, WavFileReaderWriter
public interface AudioFileReader
Implementing this interface indicates support for 'one-shot' reading of an audio file. That is, an entire audio file can be opened, read into a float[][] and then closed in a single blocking method.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SampleAudioFormat getSampleAudioFormat()
    After reading, the SampleAudioFormat can be obtained.
    java.util.HashSet<AudioFileType> getSupportedFileTypesForReading()
    Get the supported file types.
    float[][] readAudioFile​(java.lang.String filename)
    Single method to read an entire audio file in one go.

    • readAudioFile

      Single method to read an entire audio file in one go.
      Parameters:
      filename - - the name of the file to be read
      Returns:
      the samples as arrays
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      OperationUnsupportedException
      FileFormatException

    • getSampleAudioFormat

      SampleAudioFormat getSampleAudioFormat()
      After reading, the SampleAudioFormat can be obtained.
      Returns:
      the SampleAudioFormat object describing the sample data that has been read in.
